definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: We feel that offer itself is most generous under the circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 处于当前情况下，那本身就是最慷慨的价格了。

sentences.english: In this case the earthquake and tsunami .
sentences.chinese: 在当前情况下就是地震和海啸。

sentences.english: Please select the combination that best reflects your factory's current situation.
sentences.chinese: 请选出能最好地反映贵厂当前情况的最佳组合。

sentences.english: Given the current situation, they will continue to stay in the shelter.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于当前情况，他们将继续待在避难场所。

definition: cause and effects (idiom); entire process of development
the rise and fall of the terrain (idiom)/(fig.) the whole sequence of events/causes and effects
one's life experience/one's lot/one's past history
foreshadowing (literary device)/foretaste of material to come (in essay or story)
the past/impurity contracted previously (in the sentient world) (Buddhism)
The issue is in the past, and the situation has changed (idiom)./It is water under the bridge.
